TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SameSiteMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定指示 cookie 的 SameSite 属性值的常数。

span.span: Specifies constants that indicate the value for the SameSite attribute of the cookie.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由[知识库文章 4531182](https://support.microsoft.com/help/4531182/kb4531182)和[知识库文章 4524421](https://support.microsoft.com/help/4524421/kb4524421)中所述的更新修改了的行为。The behavior of was modified by updates described in [KB article 4531182](https://support.microsoft.com/help/4531182/kb4531182) and [KB article 4524421](https://support.microsoft.com/help/4524421/kb4524421). 如果没有这些更新，此 值不会发出 `SameSite` cookie 标头。Without these updates, the value does not emit the `SameSite` cookie header. 这符合 [https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-west-first-party-cookies-07#section-4.1](https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-west-first-party-cookies-07#section-4.1) 。This conforms to [https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-west-first-party-cookies-07#section-4.1](https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-west-first-party-cookies-07#section-4.1). 应用这些更新后， 该值将发出 `SameSite=None` cookie 标头。After these updates have been applied, the value emits the `SameSite=None` cookie header. 这一新行为符合 [https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-west-cookie-incrementalism-00](https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-west-cookie-incrementalism-00) 。This new behavior conforms to [https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-west-cookie-incrementalism-00](https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-west-cookie-incrementalism-00). 作为此更改的一部分， `Lax` `None` 尽管可以在 web.config 中重写这些值，但 FormsAuth 和 SessionState cookie 将与 SameSite = 而不是以前的默认值一起发布。As part of this change, FormsAuth and SessionState cookies will be issued with SameSite = `Lax` instead of the previous default of `None`, though these values can be overridden in web.config. 在应用了这些更新的系统上，可以通过将设置为来指定以前的 `SameSiteMode` 行为 `(SameSiteMode)(-1)` 。On systems where these updates have been applied, you can specify the previous behavior by setting the `SameSiteMode` to `(SameSiteMode)(-1)`. 您可以使用 web.config 中的字符串指定此行为 `Unspecified` 。You can specify this behavior using the string `Unspecified` in web.config.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.SameSiteMode Lax = int32(1)

summary.span: Cookie 将与“same-site”请求和“cross-site”顶级导航一同发送。

span.span: The cookie will be sent with "same-site" requests, and with "cross-site" top level navigation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.SameSiteMode None = int32(0)

summary.span: Cookie 将随所有请求一起发送（请参阅备注）。

span.span: The cookie will be sent with all requests (see remarks).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.SameSiteMode Strict = int32(2)

summary.span: 值为 Strict 时，Cookie 将仅与“同一站点”请求一同发送。

span.span: When the value is Strict the cookie will only be sent along with "same-site" requests.
